#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
long long fact(long long a)
{
	if(a<=1)
	return 1;
	return a*fact(a-1);
}
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long long t, r, i, x, a[11], sum;
	scanf("%lld" ,&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	x = 0;
	long long b[101] = {0};	
	sum = 0;
	for(i=0;i<11;i++)
	{scanf("%lld", &a[i]);
		b[a[i]]++;
	}
	scanf("%lld" ,&r);
	
	sort(a, a+11);
	for(i=10;r>0;i--,r--)
	{
	//	printf("%lld ", a[i]);
		if(a[i] == a[i-1])
			{
				sum++;
				x++;	
			}
		else 
			{
				sum = 0;
				x=0;
			}
	}
		if(a[i+1] == a[i])
		while(a[i+1] == a[i])
			{
				sum++;
				i--;
			}
/*	for(i = 99;i>=0&&r>x;i--)
	{
		if(b[i])
		{
			x+=b[i];
			//printf("(%lld, %lld) " ,i, b[i]);
			//r--;
		}
		if(b[i]>1)
		{//printf("%lld " ,i);
		sum+=b[i];
		}
	}
	if(sum)
	printf("%lld\n", sum);
	else
	printf("1\n");*/
	if(sum)
	printf("%lld\n", fact(sum)/fact(x)/fact(sum-x));
	else
	printf("1\n");
//	printf("\n");
}
	return 0;
}
